resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Copy Generic CSV Source to Generic SQL Sink')]

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FileName as string ('0030_SourceData1.csv'),
	SchemaName as string ('utils'),
	ViewName as string ('vw_0030_SourceData1.csv-2019-11-01T15:17:40.927'),
	DataFactoryName as string ('xxx'),
	DataFactoryPipelineName as string ('yyyy'),
	DataFactoryPipelineRunID as string ('zzzzz')
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:[($FileName)]) ~> ReadFromSourceCSVFileInBlobStorage
ReadFromSourceCSVFileInBlobStorage derive({__FileName} = $FileName,
		{__DataFactoryName} = $DataFactoryName,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineName} = $DataFactoryPipelineName,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineRunId} = $DataFactoryPipelineRunID) ~> EnrichWithDataFactoryMetadata
EnrichWithDataFactoryMetadata sink(input(
		id as string,
		{__FileName} as string,
		{__DataFactoryName} as string,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineName} as string,
		{__DataFactoryPipelineRunId} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table') ~> WriteToTargetSqlTable
